name: Bhargavi Venkataraman
title: Founder & Artistic Director
shortBio: MFA (Bharatanatyam), Grade B Doordarshan Artist. Award-winning performer and teacher.
detailedBio: Bhargavi is passionate about sharing the art of Bharatanatyam with the next generation. She believes in nurturing each student's unique strengths and encourages creative expression alongside technical mastery. Her teaching philosophy blends tradition with innovation, and she is dedicated to fostering a supportive, joyful, and disciplined learning environment.
